name: Tim Rowse
biography: Tim Rowse ('Land Rights') is an academic with degrees in political science, sociology and anthropology from the University of Sydney and Flinders University of South Australia. The author of seven books, most in the field of indigenous studies, Rowse has also worked as a teacher, consultant to Aboriginal organisations in Central Australia and health researcher, He is currently writing a study of the career of Dr H.C. Coombs.
